verses.1: Saul a sih khit, Amalek-te a thahna panin David a ciahkik ciangin Ziklag ah David ni nih om hi.
verses.2: A ni thum ni-in, a puan kikekin a lu tungah lei omin Saulʼ giahphual panin mi khat hong pai hi. David kiangah amah hong tun ciangin leilak ah pukin zahtakna a bawl hi.
verses.3: David in ama kiangah, “Koi panin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in David kiangah, “Israel giahphual panin kong suakta hi,” a ci hi.
verses.4: David in ama kiangah, “Bangci bang ahi hiam? Hong gen in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in dawngin, “Giahphual panin mite tai a, mi tampi zong pukin si uh hi. Saul le a tapa Jonathan zong a si hi,” a ci hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah a gen tangvalpa kiangah, “Saul le a tapa Jonathan a sihna bangci theih na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.6: Tua ciangin tangvalpa in, “Gilboa Mual ah ka om kha a, tua lai munah Saul a teipi tungah kingam hi.
verses.7: Saul in a nung lam hong et ciangin kei hong mu-in hong sam hi. Keimah in ka dawng a, ‘Hih lai ah om ing,’ ka ci hi.
verses.8: Saul in kei kiangah, ‘Kua na hi hiam?’ hong ci hi. Keimah in Saul ka dawng a, ‘Kei, Amalek mi ka hi hi,’ ka ci hi.
verses.9: Saul in kei kiangah, ‘Ka pangah ding inla kei hong that in; bang hang hiam cih leh gimna ka thuak a, ahi zongin ka naang lai hi,’ hong ci hi.
verses.10: Tua ahih ciangin ama pangah dingin amah ka that hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah a tuk khit ciangin nungta zo lo taktak ding hi, ci-in ka thei hi. Tua ciangin a lu tungah a om kumpi lukhu le a ban tungah a om a banbulh kong la a, tuate hih lai ka topa kiangah kong paipih hi,” a ci hi.
verses.11: Tua ciangin David in ama puante lenin bal kek a, amah tawh a om mite khempeuh in zong tua bangmahin a hih uh hi.
verses.12: Tua ahih ciangin Saul, a tapa Jonathan le Topaʼ mi Israel-te hangin amaute thumin kap uh a, nitak dong an a tang uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh gal sungah amaute si uh hi.
verses.13: Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah thu a puak tangvalpa kiangah, “Koi panin hong pai na hi hiam?” a ci hi. Amah in dawngin, “Kei pen Amalek mi peemta khatʼ tapa ka hi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.14: David in ama kiangah, “ Topaʼ sathau nilh pa a that dingin na khut na liikkhiat ding na lau loh a bangci thu ahi hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.15: Tua ciangin David in tangvalte khat samin, “Pai in; amah that lum in,” a ci hi. Amah in tua thupuak pa sat a, amah a si hi.
verses.16: Tua ciangin David in ama kiangah, “Nangma mawhna nangma lu tungah tung tahen; bang hang hiam cih leh nangma kampau in nangʼ lang khat ah teci pangin, ‘ Topaʼ sathau nilh pa ka that khin hi,’ na ci hi,” a ci hi.
verses.17: Tua ciangin Saul le a tapa Jonathanʼ hangin kah la phuakin David kap a,
verses.18: amah in Judah mite tungah hih kah la a kihilh nading thu a pia hi. Tua la pen Jashar Laibu sungah kigelh hi. Amah in:
verses.19: “Israel aw, na minthanna, na mual sangte tungah kithat! A vanglian pa bangci-in tuk!
verses.20: Gath khua sungah gen kei in. Ashkelon kongzing ah genthang kei in. Filistia numeite lungdam kha ding, dawibia numeite nuamin diang kha ding.
verses.21: “No Gilboa mualte aw, daitui ahi a, guahtui ahi zongin, na tung uh ah omsak kei un. Tui thukpi kilok zong omsak kei un! Bang hang hiam cih leh a vanglian paʼ lum nin a, Saulʼ lum, sathau kinuh lo hi.
verses.22: “Jonathanʼ thaltang gupha a, Saulʼ namsau zong kihtakhuai hi. Jonathanʼ thaltang guakkik lo a, Saulʼ namsau zong hong guakkik lo hi.
verses.23: “Saul le Jonathan, ki-it uh a, it-huai uh! A sih a hinin amaute kikhen lo a, muvanlai sangin zaptel zaw uh a, humpinelkai sangin thahat zaw uh hi.
verses.24: “No Israel numeite aw, Saulʼ hangin kap un. Puansan neel a silh, na puan tung uh ah kizepna kham a suangte aw, ama hangin kap un.
verses.25: “A vanglian pa bangci-in tuk galphual sungah! Jonathan aw, na mual sangte tungah nang hong kithat hi.
verses.26: Nangma hangin ka lungkham hi, ka sanggam Jonathan; kei nong itna lamdang a, numeiʼ itna sangin lian zaw hi.
verses.27: “A vanglian pa bangci-in tuk, galhiamte bangci-in sia!” a ci hi.
